# success(with:)

**Type Method**

Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.

## Declaration

```swift
class func success(with resolvedPlacemark: CLPlacemark) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **resolvedPlacemark**: The object that resolves the requested parameter of the intent. This value may be different than the one specified in the intent object.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPlacemarkResolutionResult] object.

## Discussion

Use this method to create a result object when you are able to resolve the placemark successfully and use it to handle the intent.

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.
- **disambiguation(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
